Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

2 Leeks and wash
5 Crimini Mushrooms and wash
2 Garlic Cloves
1 Soy Sauce
0.5 Siracha Sauce
0.25 Pepper Flake
1 Hoison Sauce
3 Vegetable Oils

Recipe

Put 3 Seconds Vegetable Oils in pantelligent on 4 / stove top on 6
Cut in half 2 Leeks
Cut leek in strips and soak in glass bowl of water
Chop 2 Garlic Cloves
Cut 5 Crimini Mushrooms
Wait 5 minutes put vegetables in pan
Put in 1 x (1 tsp) Soy Sauce
Put in 0.5 x (1 tbsp) Siracha Sauce
Put in 0.25 x (1 tbsp) Pepper Flake
Put in 1 x (1 tsp) Hoison Sauce
Wait 2 minutes
